descriptionType.name: descriptionType

options.name: Set Automatically
options.description: Automatically set based on resource and operation

descriptionType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.ai_hint: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

authentication.name: authentication

options.name: Bot Token
options.description: Manage messages, channels, and members on a server

options.name: OAuth2
options.description: Same features as 'Bot Token' with easier Bot installation

options.name: Webhook
options.description: Send messages to a specific channel

authentication.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。 与鉴权相关，注意不要在公共日志中输出敏感信息。

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation

options.name: Send a Message
options.description: Send a message to a channel using the webhook

operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

guildId.name: guildId
guildId.description: Select the server (guild) that your bot is connected to

properties.errorMessage: Not a valid Discord Server URL
Not a valid Discord Server ID

guildId.ai_hint: Select the server (guild) that your bot is connected to

channelId.name: channelId
channelId.description: Select the channel by name, URL, or ID

properties.errorMessage: Not a valid Discord Channel URL
Not a valid Discord Channel ID

channelId.ai_hint: Select the channel by name, URL, or ID

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

options.name: options
avatar_url
options.description: Override the default avatar of the webhook

options.name: tts
options.description: Whether to have a bot reading the message directly in the channel

options.name: username
options.description: Override the default username of the webhook

options.name: wait
options.description: Whether wait for the message to be created before returning its response

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

emoji.name: emoji
emoji.description: The emoji you want to react with
emoji.ai_hint: The emoji you want to react with

sendTo.name: sendTo
sendTo.description: Send message to a channel or DM to a user
sendTo.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

userId.name: userId
userId.description: Select the user you want to assign a role to
userId.ai_hint: Select the user you want to assign a role to

content.name: content
content.description: The content of the message (up to 2000 characters)
content.ai_hint: The content of the message (up to 2000 characters)

embeds.name: embeds

values.name: description
values.description: The description of embed

values.name: author
values.description: The name of the author

values.name: color
values.description: Color code of the embed

values.name: timestamp
values.description: The time displayed at the bottom of the embed. Provide in ISO8601 format.

values.name: title
values.description: The title of embed

values.name: url
values.description: The URL where you want to link the embed to

values.name: image
values.description: Source URL of image (only supports http(s) and attachments)

values.name: thumbnail
values.description: Source URL of thumbnail (only supports http(s) and attachments)

values.name: video
values.description: Source URL of video

embeds.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

files.name: files

values.name: inputFieldName
values.description: The contents of the file being sent with the message
values.hint: The name of the input field containing the binary file data to be sent

files.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

responseType.name: responseType

options.name: Approval
options.description: User can approve/disapprove from within the message

options.name: Free Text
options.description: User can submit a response via a form

options.name: Custom Form
options.description: User can submit a response via a custom form

responseType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

defineForm.name: defineForm
defineForm.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

jsonOutput.name: jsonOutput

formFields.name: formFields

values.name: fieldLabel
values.description: Label that appears above the input field

values.name: fieldName
values.description: The name of the field, used in input attributes and referenced by the workflow

values.name: fieldType
values.description: The type of field to add to the form

values.name: elementName
values.description: Optional field. It can be used to include the html in the output.

values.name: placeholder
values.description: Sample text to display inside the field

values.name: defaultValue
values.description: Default value that will be pre-filled in the form field

values.name: defaultValue
values.description: Default date value that will be pre-filled in the form field (format: YYYY-MM-DD)

values.name: defaultValue
values.description: Default value that will be pre-selected. Must match one of the option labels.

values.name: defaultValue
values.description: Default value(s) that will be pre-selected. Must match one or multiple of the option labels. Separate multiple pre-selected options with a comma.

values.name: fieldValue
values.description: Input value can be set here or will be passed as a query parameter via Field Name if no value is set

values.name: fieldOptions
values.description: List of options that can be selected from the dropdown

values.displayName: Multiple Choice is a legacy option, please use Checkboxes or Radio Buttons field type instead
values.name: multiselectLegacyNotice
multiselect
values.description: Whether to allow the user to select multiple options from the dropdown list

values.name: html
values.description: HTML elements to display on the form page

values.name: multipleFiles
values.description: Whether to allow the user to select multiple files from the file input or just one

values.name: acceptFileTypes
values.description: Comma-separated list of allowed file extensions
values.hint: Leave empty to allow all file types

values.displayName: The displayed date is formatted based on the locale of the user's browser
values.name: formatDate
requiredField
values.description: Whether to require the user to enter a value for this field before submitting the form

formFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

approvalOptions.name: approvalOptions
approvalOptions.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

name.name: name
name.description: The new name of the channel. Fill this field only if you want to change the channel's name.
name.ai_hint: The new name of the channel. Fill this field only if you want to change the channel's name.

type.name: type
type.description: The type of channel to create
type.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

after.name: after
after.description: The ID of the user after which to return the members
after.ai_hint: The ID of the user after which to return the members

role.name: role
role.description: Select the roles you want to add to the user
role.ai_hint: Select the roles you want to add to the user

conditional_rules: IF descriptionType == 'manual' THEN SHOW parameter 'toolDescription'
IF authentication == 'webhook' THEN HIDE parameter 'resource'
IF resource == 'message' AND authentication IN ["botToken", "oAuth2"] THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'message' AND authentication IN ["botToken", "oAuth2"] THEN SHOW parameter 'guildId'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF authentication == 'webhook' THEN HIDE parameter 'channelId'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF authentication == 'webhook' THEN HIDE parameter 'returnAll'
IF returnAll == False AND resource == 'message' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF authentication == 'webhook' THEN HIDE parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF authentication == 'webhook' THEN HIDE parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'react' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'react' THEN SHOW parameter 'messageId'
IF authentication == 'webhook' THEN HIDE parameter 'messageId'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'react' THEN SHOW parameter 'emoji'
IF authentication == 'webhook' THEN HIDE parameter 'emoji'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'send' THEN SHOW parameter 'sendTo'
IF authentication == 'webhook' THEN HIDE parameter 'sendTo'
IF sendTo == 'user' AND resource == 'message' AND operation == 'send' THEN SHOW parameter 'userId'
IF authentication == 'webhook' THEN HIDE parameter 'userId'
IF sendTo == 'channel' AND resource == 'message' AND operation == 'send' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'send' THEN SHOW parameter 'content'
IF authentication == 'webhook' THEN HIDE parameter 'content'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'send' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'send' THEN SHOW parameter 'embeds'
IF authentication == 'webhook' THEN HIDE parameter 'embeds'
IF inputMethod == 'json' THEN SHOW parameter 'json'
IF inputMethod == 'fields' THEN SHOW parameter 'description'
IF inputMethod == 'fields' THEN SHOW parameter 'author'
IF inputMethod == 'fields' THEN SHOW parameter 'color'
IF inputMethod == 'fields' THEN SHOW parameter 'timestamp'
IF inputMethod == 'fields' THEN SHOW parameter 'title'
IF inputMethod == 'fields' THEN SHOW parameter 'url'
IF inputMethod == 'fields' THEN SHOW parameter 'image'
IF inputMethod == 'fields' THEN SHOW parameter 'thumbnail'
IF inputMethod == 'fields' THEN SHOW parameter 'video'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'send' THEN SHOW parameter 'files'
IF authentication == 'webhook' THEN HIDE parameter 'files'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'deleteMessage' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'deleteMessage' THEN SHOW parameter 'messageId'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'messageId'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'sendAndWait' THEN SHOW parameter 'sendTo'
IF sendTo == 'user' AND resource == 'message' AND operation == 'sendAndWait' THEN SHOW parameter 'userId'
IF sendTo == 'channel' AND resource == 'message' AND operation == 'sendAndWait' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'sendAndWait' THEN SHOW parameter 'message'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'sendAndWait' THEN SHOW parameter 'responseType'
IF responseType == 'customForm' AND resource == 'message' AND operation == 'sendAndWait' THEN SHOW parameter 'defineForm'
IF defineForm == 'json' AND responseType == 'customForm' AND resource == 'message' AND operation == 'sendAndWait' THEN SHOW parameter 'jsonOutput'
IF defineForm == 'fields' AND responseType == 'customForm' AND resource == 'message' AND operation == 'sendAndWait' THEN SHOW parameter 'formFields'
IF fieldType IN ["hiddenField", "html"] THEN HIDE parameter 'fieldLabel'
IF fieldType == 'hiddenField' THEN SHOW parameter 'fieldName'
IF fieldType == 'html' THEN SHOW parameter 'elementName'
IF fieldType IN ["dropdown", "date", "file", "html", "hiddenField", "radio", "checkbox"] THEN HIDE parameter 'placeholder'
IF fieldType IN ["text", "number", "email", "textarea"] THEN SHOW parameter 'defaultValue'
IF fieldType == 'date' THEN SHOW parameter 'defaultValue'
IF fieldType IN ["dropdown", "radio"] THEN SHOW parameter 'defaultValue'
IF fieldType == 'checkbox' THEN SHOW parameter 'defaultValue'
IF fieldType == 'hiddenField' THEN SHOW parameter 'fieldValue'
IF fieldType == 'dropdown' THEN SHOW parameter 'fieldOptions'
IF fieldType == 'checkbox' THEN SHOW parameter 'fieldOptions'
IF fieldType == 'radio' THEN SHOW parameter 'fieldOptions'
IF multiselect == True AND fieldType == 'dropdown' AND @version == {'_cnd': {'lt': 2.3}} THEN SHOW parameter 'multiselectLegacyNotice'
IF fieldType == 'dropdown' AND @version == {'_cnd': {'lt': 2.3}} THEN SHOW parameter 'multiselect'
IF fieldType == 'checkbox' THEN SHOW parameter 'limitSelection'
IF fieldType == 'checkbox' AND limitSelection == 'exact' THEN SHOW parameter 'numberOfSelections'
IF fieldType == 'checkbox' AND limitSelection == 'range' THEN SHOW parameter 'minSelections'
IF fieldType == 'checkbox' AND limitSelection == 'range' THEN SHOW parameter 'maxSelections'
IF fieldType == 'html' THEN SHOW parameter 'html'
IF fieldType == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'multipleFiles'
IF fieldType == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'acceptFileTypes'
IF fieldType == 'date' THEN SHOW parameter 'formatDate'
IF fieldType IN ["html", "hiddenField"] THEN HIDE parameter 'requiredField'
IF responseType == 'approval' AND resource == 'message' AND operation == 'sendAndWait' THEN SHOW parameter 'approvalOptions'
IF approvalType IN ["single", "double"] THEN SHOW parameter 'approveLabel'
IF approvalType == 'double' THEN SHOW parameter 'disapproveLabel'
IF responseType == 'approval' AND resource == 'message' AND operation == 'sendAndWait' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF limitType == 'afterTimeInterval' THEN SHOW parameter 'resumeAmount'
IF limitType == 'afterTimeInterval' THEN SHOW parameter 'resumeUnit'
IF limitType == 'atSpecifiedTime' THEN SHOW parameter 'maxDateAndTime'
IF responseType IN ["freeText", "customForm"] AND resource == 'message' AND operation == 'sendAndWait' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'channel' AND authentication IN ["botToken", "oAuth2"] THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'channel' AND authentication IN ["botToken", "oAuth2"] THEN SHOW parameter 'guildId'
IF resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF authentication == 'webhook' THEN HIDE parameter 'name'
IF resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'type'
IF authentication == 'webhook' THEN HIDE parameter 'type'
IF resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF /type == '4' THEN HIDE parameter 'nsfw'
IF /type == '2' THEN SHOW parameter 'bitrate'
IF /type == '4' THEN HIDE parameter 'categoryId'
IF /type == '4' THEN HIDE parameter 'rate_limit_per_user'
IF /type == '4' THEN HIDE parameter 'topic'
IF /type == '2' THEN SHOW parameter 'user_limit'
IF resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'deleteChannel' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF returnAll == False AND resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'member' AND authentication IN ["botToken", "oAuth2"] THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'member' AND authentication IN ["botToken", "oAuth2"] THEN SHOW parameter 'guildId'
IF resource == 'member' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF returnAll == False AND resource == 'member' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'member' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'after'
IF authentication == 'webhook' THEN HIDE parameter 'after'
IF resource == 'member' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'member' AND operation == 'roleAdd' THEN SHOW parameter 'userId'
IF resource == 'member' AND operation == 'roleAdd' THEN SHOW parameter 'role'
IF authentication == 'webhook' THEN HIDE parameter 'role'
IF resource == 'member' AND operation == 'roleRemove' THEN SHOW parameter 'userId'
IF resource == 'member' AND operation == 'roleRemove' THEN SHOW parameter 'role'
IF authentication == 'webhook' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'sendLegacy' THEN SHOW parameter 'content'
IF authentication IN ["botToken", "oAuth2"] THEN HIDE parameter 'content'
IF operation == 'sendLegacy' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF authentication IN ["botToken", "oAuth2"] THEN HIDE parameter 'options'
IF operation == 'sendLegacy' THEN SHOW parameter 'embeds'
IF authentication IN ["botToken", "oAuth2"] THEN HIDE parameter 'embeds'
IF operation == 'sendLegacy' THEN SHOW parameter 'files'
IF authentication IN ["botToken", "oAuth2"] THEN HIDE parameter 'files'
